AODCore.sound



Allows you to play sounds as well as manipulate them (position, volume, etc) At the moment only works with OGG filetypes.


Example:

  uint s = AOD.Load_Sound("test-song.ogg");
  AOD.Play_Sound(s);


uint Load_Sound(string file_name);
Registers sound to be playable

Return:
A handle to the sound

uint Play_Sound(uint handle, float volume = 0.8F, float x = 0.00000F, float y = 0.00000F, float z = 0.00000F);
Plays sound from given handle

Return:
Index to the given handle

void Stop_Sound(uint index);
Stops sound from given index

void Change_Sound_Position(immutable(uint) handle, immutable(float) x, immutable(float) y, immutable(float) z);
Changes the position of the sound from given handle

void Change_Sound_Volume(immutable(uint) handle, immutable(float) volume);
Changes the volume of the sound from given handle (out of 1.00)

void Clean_Up_Sound();
Stops all sounds

void End_Sound();
clens up and closes ALC Device
